scripts.build: $(npm bin)/bower install && $(npm bin)/pulp build && npm run build:examples
scripts.build:examples: PATH=`echo $PATH | sed -e 's/:\.\/node_modules\/\.bin//'` find examples -maxdepth 2 -type f -iname makefile -execdir make \;
scripts.audit:examples: PATH=`echo $PATH | sed -e 's/:\.\/node_modules\/\.bin//'` find examples -maxdepth 2 -type f -iname makefile -execdir npm audit fix \;
